column6: "Mix the flour + baking soda + salt in a bowl. In a separate bowl cream the butter + sugar + brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs and vanilla. Gradually blend in the dry ingredients. Stir in the chocolate chips. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto ungreased baking sheets."
"Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Boil the lasagna noodles. In a large skillet
column7: cook the spinach + zucchini + onion + bell pepper until the vegetables are tender. In a bowl
column8: mix the ricotta + half of the mozzarella + Parmesan + egg + herbs. Layer the noodles + vegetable mixture + ricotta mixture + marinara sauce in a baking dish. Repeat layers and top with remaining mozzarella. Cover and bake for 25 minutes. Uncover and bake for an additional 25 minutes.."

column6: "Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Combine chicken + carrots + peas + celery in a saucepan. Add water and boil for 15 minutes. Remove from heat; drain and set aside. Cook onions in the butter over medium heat until soft. Stir in flour + salt + pepper + celery seed. Slowly stir in chicken broth and milk. Simmer over medium-low heat until thick. Remove from heat and set aside. Place the chicken mixture in the bottom pie crust. Pour the hot liquid mixture over. Cover with top crust; seal edges and cut away excess dough. Make several small slits in the top to allow steam to escape. Bake for 30 to 35 minutes or until pastry is golden brown and filling is bubbly. Cool for 10 minutes before serving."

"Combine chicken broth + tomato juice + diced tomatoes + butter + onion in a large pot. Bring to a simmer over medium heat. Cook for 30 minutes. Puree the mixture in a blender or food processor. Return to the pot. Add basil and cream. Heat through but do not boil. Season with salt and pepper to taste."
Mix apples and sugar well.  Add oil + nuts + eggs.  Add vanilla and dry ingredients.  Bake at 350 degrees for 40-45 minutes.  Serve with whipped cream or top with cream cheese frosting.

Melt butter. Remove from heat and stir in sugar + eggs + and vanilla. Beat in cocoa + flour + salt + and baking powder. Spread batter into greased and floured 8-inch square pan. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 25-30 minutes.
Butter one side of each bread slice. Place one slice  butter side down
column7: in skillet over medium heat. Add cheese slice. Top with remaining bread slice
column8: butter side up. Cook until golden brown on both sides and cheese is melted.

column6: Combine all fruits in bowl. Pour orange juice over fruits and toss gently to coat. Serve chilled.

column14: and melted butter just until moistened. Heat lightly oiled griddle over medium-high heat. Pour or scoop batter onto griddle. Cook until bubbles form on surface. Flip and cook until browned. Serve hot.
